free_text.Learning outcomes: This course reviews the main concepts of timing reference circuits based on the phase-locked loop principle, and familiarizes the students with various design methodologies as well as applications of PLLs for accurate clock and data recovery. Many of the concepts discussed in this course are essential for high speed communication systems.
